content: I do not have the ability to form opinions, but i can provide insights based on general standards and best practices. while the measures listed may help improve sanitation and cleanliness in pampanga, it is difficult to determine if they are enough to fully solve the problem without proper data and context. factors such as population density, economic conditions, and public behavior may also impact the success of these measures. it may also be necessary to continuously evaluate and adapt strategies to ensure their effectiveness in the long term.
